content: *all my designs are free to download if you enjoy them please consider making a donation to your local humane society or animal care organization * casual asymmetrical poncho is knit in the round top down using stockinette and reverse stockinette stitches after blocking neck edge gently curls flowing beautifully into body section and the deep bottom border which is knit in reverse stockinette instructions are also included for a cowl neck calla poncho pattern includes sizes s m l xl and xxl a sizing guide based on neck/cowl neck opening and bust measurements is also included you will need 750 - 1 550 or more meters dk weight yarn 4 00mm needles and 3 stitch markers length is adjustable try on as you knit and add length if needed blocking is required blue poncho is knit with cowl neck and brown poncho is knit without cowl neck both ponchos are size l and shown on us size 12 dressform enjoy materials without cowl neck 750 to 1250 or more meters dk yarn with cowl neck 950 to 1550 or more meters dk yarn 4 00mm / us6 circular knitting needles 24 and 40 2 stitch markers 1 unique stitch marker stitches / techniques used stockinette reverse stockinette yarn overs *pattern information* number of pages 2 language s english instructions written sizes 5 neck circumference length is adjustable photos 2
